prompts: Create a fighting-type Pokemon that looks agile and ready for combat with striking colors.
Imagine a playful Pokemon with cute features and a mix of yellow and red hues.
Design a bipedal Pokemon that can be found in forests and mountains, showcasing its fighting spirit.
Generate a Pokemon with unique markings and a vibrant color palette, perfect for a competitive battle.
Show me a small Pokemon that excels in agility and has a distinct fighting style.
Make an adorable Pokemon that embodies energy and determination, with a focus on speed.
Give me a Pokemon that is both fierce and friendly, with a design that stands out in any environment.

distinctive_features: Tail resembling a martial arts belt
